languages.text: Перед вами пылающий мир — неприветливое место, отданное во власть огня своей удушливой атмосферой и близостью к звезде. Пожары и огненные шторма пылают тут постоянно. Что может Касбаллика искать в подобном месте?

traits.locale_text: Перед вами пылающий мир — неприветливое место, отданное во власть огня своей удушливой атмосферой и близостью к звезде. Пожары и огненные шторма пылают тут постоянно. Что может Касбаллика искать в подобном месте?

languages.text: Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?
languages.original_text: Перед вами пылающий мир — неприветливое место, отданное во власть огня своей удушливой атмосферой и близостью к звезде. Пожары и огненные шторма пылают тут постоянно. Что может Касбаллика искать в подобном месте?

traits.locale_text: Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place where flames reign supreme due to its chocking atmosphere and close proximity to the star. The fire storms on its surface never end. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place where flames reign supreme due to its chocking atmosphere and close proximity to the star. The fire storms on its surface never end. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

languages.text: 在你面前的是一个燃烧世界。这颗行星过于靠近此星系的恒星，大气层也厚重得令人窒息，因此变成了永恒的炽热炼狱，完全不适宜居住。行星表面的烈焰风暴永远都不会停止，卡斯巴利卡会在这样的地方寻找什么呢？
languages.original_text: Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

traits.locale_text: 在你面前的是一个燃烧世界。这颗行星过于靠近此星系的恒星，大气层也厚重得令人窒息，因此变成了永恒的炽热炼狱，完全不适宜居住。行星表面的烈焰风暴永远都不会停止，卡斯巴利卡会在这样的地方寻找什么呢？

languages.text: 目の前に広がるのは灼熱の世界。息苦しい大気と恒星に近接しているため、永久に燃え続ける炎に翻弄される過酷な地だ。地表の火の嵐は絶えることがない。カスバリカは、そんな場所でいったい何を探していたのだろう？
languages.original_text: Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

traits.locale_text: 目の前に広がるのは灼熱の世界。息苦しい大気と恒星に近接しているため、永久に燃え続ける炎に翻弄される過酷な地だ。地表の火の嵐は絶えることがない。カスバリカは、そんな場所でいったい何を探していたのだろう？

languages.text: Ante ti hay un mundo ardiente, un lugar inhóspito a merced de un infierno perpetuo debido a su atmósfera sofocante y a su proximidad a la estrella del sistema. Las tormentas de fuego en su superficie no cesan nunca. ¿Qué podría buscar la Kasballica en un lugar así?
languages.original_text: Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

traits.locale_text: Ante ti hay un mundo {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g}, un lugar inhóspito a merced de un infierno perpetuo debido a su atmósfera sofocante y a su proximidad a la estrella del sistema. Las tormentas de fuego en su superficie no cesan nunca. ¿Qué podría buscar la Kasballica en un lugar así?

languages.text: Vor dir liegt eine brennende Welt, ein unwirtlicher Planet, der der Gnade eines unaufhörlichen Infernos ausgeliefert ist, bedingt durch die erstickende Atmosphäre und die Nähe zum Stern des Systems. Die Feuerstürme auf der Oberfläche lassen niemals nach. Was könnten die Kasballica auf einem solchen Planeten suchen?
languages.original_text: Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

traits.locale_text: Vor dir liegt eine brennende Welt, ein unwirtlicher Planet, der der Gnade eines unaufhörlichen Infernos ausgeliefert ist, bedingt durch die erstickende Atmosphäre und die Nähe zum Stern des Systems. Die Feuerstürme auf der Oberfläche lassen niemals nach. Was könnten die Kasballica auf einem solchen Planeten suchen?

languages.text: Devant vous se dresse un monde brûlant, une planète inhospitalière à la merci d'un brasier perpétuel attisé par son atmosphère suffocante et sa trop grande proximité avec l'étoile du système. Les tempêtes de feu qui font rage à sa surface jamais ne s'éteignent. Qu'est-ce que la Kasballica peut bien chercher dans un endroit pareil ?
languages.original_text: Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?

traits.locale_text: Devant vous se dresse un monde brûlant, une planète inhospitalière à la merci d'un brasier perpétuel attisé par son atmosphère suffocante et sa trop grande proximité avec l'étoile du système. Les tempêtes de feu qui font rage à sa surface jamais ne s'éteignent. Qu'est-ce que la Kasballica peut bien chercher dans un endroit pareil ?

languages.text: Karşında yanan bir dünya duruyor. Sistemin yıldızına fazla yakın oluşu ve bunaltıcı atmosferi yüzünden daima alevler içinde olan, yaşama elverişsiz bir gezegen bu. Gezegenin yüzeyindeki ateş fırtınaları asla son bulmuyor. Kasballica böyle bir yerde ne arıyor olabilir?
languages.original_text: Before you is a burning world, an inhospitable place at the mercy of a perpetual inferno due to its suffocating atmosphere and close proximity to the system's star. The fire storms on its surface never cease. What could the Kasballica be looking for in such a place?
